org.aludratest.content.flat.webdecs

Class FlatFileBeanWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aludratest.content.flat.webdecs.FlatFileBeanWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class FlatFileBeanWriter
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Reads beans from a flat file using the Databene Webdecs library.
    Author:
    Volker Bergmann

      FlatFileBeanWriter(Writer out, Locale defaultLocale, List<org.databene.formats.fixedwidth.FixedWidthRowTypeDescriptor> rowFormats)
      Constructor which instantiates the internal writer and forwards the argument to it.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the internal writer.
      void writeRow(Object bean)
      Chooses the row format by the bean class, formats the bean graph elements accordingly and writes them to the output stream.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlatFileBeanWriter

        public FlatFileBeanWriter(Writer out,
                          Locale defaultLocale,
                          List<org.databene.formats.fixedwidth.FixedWidthRowTypeDescriptor> rowFormats)
        Constructor which instantiates the internal writer and forwards the argument to it.
        Parameters:
        out - the writer to send the formatted character data to
        defaultLocale - the default locale to use for formatting numbers and dates
        rowFormats - the row formats to apply

    • Method Detail

      • writeRow

        public void writeRow(Object bean)
              throws IOException
        Chooses the row format by the bean class, formats the bean graph elements accordingly and writes them to the output stream.
        Parameters:
        bean - the Java object to export
        Throws:
        IOException - if file output fails
